ApiKeyHeaderName.name: x-api-key
ApiKeyHeaderName.description: ApiKey that allows generating access tokens.

error.example: Token missing or invalid token format

get.summary: Get attributes list (if no query parameters returns first 25 attributes)

200.description: List of attributes and total count of attributes

get.summary: Get policies list (if no query parameters returns first 25 policies)

200.description: List of policies and total count of policies

delete.summary: Removes a policy (identified either by id or resource and attribute)

post.summary: Creates token which will be used to reset the user password
post.description: Create a password reset token with will be used to find if the user started action to change password

If a user wants to reset the password without providing old one first the user needs to receive "resetPasswordToken" from /password-reset-token endpoint. After that user need to send newPassword and to valid URL with resetPasswordToken in parameter. If the user won't provide newPassword in the body the password will be generated randomly

201.description: Returns password when generater otherwise empty body

post.description: Creates new token with default policies and attributes without SUPERADMIN_ROLE attribute

get.summary: Get access keys list (if no query parameters returns first 25 keys)

200.description: List of access keys and total count of keys

post.summary: Adds a new attribute for a given user

get.description: Returns a user id by user name

get.summary: Get users list (if no query parameters returns first 25 users)

200.description: List of users and total count of users

get.summary: Verifies whether user has access to a specific resource.

200.description: Returns an object determining whether user has all attributes and a list of owned attributes.

error.example: child "username" fails because ["username" is not allowed to be empty]
child "username" fails because ["username" is not allowed to be empty]

post.summary: Returns token with will be used to reset the user password
post.description: Create a password reset token with will be used to find if the user started action to change password

post.summary: Refresh user's active token if token has expired.

403.description: Forbidden Error the user is already active

delete.summary: Removes an attribute for a user

post.description: If a user wants to reset the password without providing old one first the user needs to receive "resetPasswordToken" from /password-reset-token endpoint. After that user need to send newPassword and to valid URL with resetPasswordToken in parameter. If the user won't provide newPassword in the body the password will be generated randomly

201.description: Returns password when generater otherwise empty body

post.description: If a normal user wants to change his password the user needs to send newPassword and oldPassword. If an admin user wants to set a new password for a user, the admin needs to send username and newPassword
